parameters.name: FlattenMode
parameters.description:
The CNAME flattening mode. Valid values:

*   flatten_all: flattens all CNAMEs.
*   flatten_at_root: flattens only the root domain. Default: flatten_at_root

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: The website ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) operation.
